Description: Set up Calculator with entity data

Task_ID: 1. W1-W24 represent weeks 1-24 (6 months). X = task active that week. M = milestone.
2. Update Status: Not Started / In Progress / Complete / Delayed / Blocked
3. Update Pct_Complete as tasks progress (0% to 100%)
4. Dependencies: Task cannot start until dependent tasks complete
6. This template assumes January 2026 start for June 2026 filing
